• To Be Honest

    Skip Tags
    • #Autism
    • #Creature
    • #Peaceful
    • #TBH
    • #Vancouver

    The creature stared at me with wide black eyes
    I had taken a look when I heard a sound by the bin
    Bright fur lit gold — in the sodium light
    To be honest, it said — I prefer the chicken
